tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: SELECT usersession.country AS Country, usersession.region AS Region, usersession.city AS City, count(usersession.city) AS actions, min(duration) as min, avg(duration) as avg, max(duration) AS max FROM useraction WHERE application='MyApp' AND name<>"ICA latency measurement" GROUP BY Country,Region,City ORDER BY actions DESC

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: SELECT usersession.country AS Country, usersession.region AS Region, usersession.city AS City, min(duration) as min, avg(duration) as avg, max(duration) AS max FROM useraction WHERE application='MyApp' AND name="ICA latency measurement" GROUP BY Country,Region,City ORDER BY avg DESC
